data.text: tired we still have so far to go to get back to the special things we cherish and the mundane things we have come to cherish; #wearamask, #socialdistance until the vaccine makes its way around the globe with more determination than the virus itself - #dontthrowawayourshot. 3/3

sad for those who won't have the chance, and the loved ones they left behind; angry it didn't have to be this way - we must act as a global society for the greater good, must do more to support those who need it to be able to stem the tide of this virus;  2/3
